mapper.select: SELECT f.MODEL_CODE, f.MODEL_NAME, f.FILEPATH, f.BRAND_NAME, f.CATEGORY_NAME FROM (SELECT rank, b.model_code, b.model_name, b.filepath, c.brand_name, d.category_name FROM (SELECT e.* FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY help_cnt DESC ) rank, model_code, help_cnt FROM manual) e WHERE rank <= 10) a LEFT OUTER JOIN model_info b ON a.model_code = b.model_code LEFT OUTER JOIN brand c ON b.brand_code = c.brand_code LEFT OUTER JOIN category d ON b.category_code = d.category_code ORDER BY rank) f

SELECT a.*, c.category_name FROM (SELECT brand_name , m.model_name, m.model_code, m.filepath , m.category_code FROM brand b INNER JOIN (SELECT filepath, model_name, model_code, brand_code, model_info.category_code FROM model_info WHERE substr(category_code, 0,5) like (SELECT l_code || m_code category_code FROM m_catg WHERE m_name like #{m_name})) m ON b.brand_code = m.brand_code) a LEFT OUTER JOIN category c ON c.category_code = a.category_code

AND ROWNUM <=5

SELECT b.brand_name, m.model_name, m.model_code, m.filepath, c.category_name FROM (SELECT model_info.* FROM (SELECT model_name FROM name_div WHERE LOWER(model_name_div) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{search_div_text}) || '%') d INNER JOIN model_info ON (model_info.model_name = d.model_name OR model_info.model_code = d.model_name)) m LEFT OUTER JOIN category c ON c.category_code = m.category_code LEFT OUTER JOIN brand b ON b.brand_code = m.brand_code

SELECT b.brand_name, m.model_name, m.model_code, m.filepath, c.category_name FROM (SELECT model_info.* FROM (SELECT model_name FROM name_div WHERE LOWER(model_name_div) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{search_div_text})||'%' AND codename like 'n') d INNER JOIN model_info ON (model_info.model_name = d.model_name OR model_info.model_code = d.model_name)) m LEFT OUTER JOIN category c ON c.category_code = m.category_code LEFT OUTER JOIN brand b ON b.brand_code = m.brand_code

SELECT b.brand_name, m.model_name, m.model_code, m.filepath, c.category_name FROM (SELECT model_info.* FROM (SELECT model_name FROM name_div WHERE LOWER(model_name_div) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{search_div_text})||'%' AND codename like 'c') d INNER JOIN model_info ON (model_info.model_name = d.model_name OR model_info.model_code = d.model_name)) m LEFT OUTER JOIN category c ON c.category_code = m.category_code LEFT OUTER JOIN brand b ON b.brand_code = m.brand_code
